title: Quiz - Pluriels et Articles
description: Quiz sur les formes plurielles et l'usage des articles a/an

questions.question: Which plural form is correct?
questions.explanation: 'We are' is the correct plural form of 'to be'.

questions.question: Which article is correct?
questions.explanation: 'An' is used before words starting with a vowel sound.

questions.question: How do you ask about objects?
questions.explanation: 'What are they?' is used to ask about objects.
